content: Due to the coronavirus outbreak, we are all in our respective homes in the world.

Hi, you might be here because you got a message from me having subscribed you to this stream after we made it a new default stream. Unfortunately, there is no way for us to add existing users without that notification. Apologies for any annoyances this caused. In general, if you truly don't want to hear from this chat anymore, you can deactivate email notifications or even your account in the settings.
you can also mute the stream if you don't want to hear people talking about earth
Actually, now that we live in the same place, maybe we can organize an online meeting via zoom discord.
why not meet lol, discord is so iffy if you ask me
